Re: Basic Metabolic Profile

AA021.description:
September 14, 2020




Jack Kyser

501 Valley Rd

Bluffton, OH  45817


Dear (parents/guardian of) Jack Kyser,


Re: CBC and Chest X-Ray


I am pleased to inform you that your recent test results were within normal limits.  Your chest x-ray did not indicate any active pneumonia infection.  Please be sure to finish your antibiotic and schedule an appointment to follow up if your symptoms are not resolved.




Sincerely,


Maya Reddy, MD



Maya Reddy, MD


Enc: Test results

AA005.description:
November 21, 2020




James Phillips

34951 Hickory Lane

Arcadia, OH  44804


Dear James Phillips,


Re: CBC, UA, Metabolic Profile, Lipid Profile, and Chest X-Ray


I am pleased to inform you that your recent test results were all within normal limits.  Your chest x-ray did not indicate any active infection.  Your cholesterol is in a satisfactory range.  Please be sure to continue to take your cholesterol medications as prescribed and follow a low-fat diet.  Follow up in six months, sooner if needed.




Sincerely,


James Ingram, MD



James Ingram, MD


Enc: Test results
